modName: More Perk Points Per Level by Sjogga
summary: Changes how many perks you get per level.
descriptionHtml:
==================
Requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE v1.5.9[/url] to work.

SKSE Installation video by Gopher can be found [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xTGnQIiNVqA&feature=plcp]HERE[/url]
==================

[b]What this mod does:[/b]
Everytime you level up you gain extra perk points (Default 0.5 bonus point)

You can configure the amount by typing:
set _morePerksBonusMult [u]to[/u] <value>
in the console. Note that there is a space between [i]set[/i] and [i]_morePerksBonusMult[/i]

For example:
[i]set _morePerksBonusMult to 2.0[/i]
gives you 2 extra perk points per level (for a total of three)

[i]set _morePerksBonusMult to 0.25[/i]
gives you 1 extra perk point every four level.

--

[b]Optional version:[/b]
Gives you 0 bonus points between level 1-29.
Gives you 1*multiplier bonus points between level 30-49.
Gives you 2*multiplier bonus points per level above 50.

(where multiplier is the value of _morePerksBonusMult)

--

[b]This affects existing characters as well![/b]
The next time you level up with an existing character, the game will add all missing perk points.

==================

Installation:
Use NMM
or
Extract into Skyrim Folder
Make sure SKSE is installed.

To install the optional version:
- install the main file
- install the optional file. Hit yes when you are asked if you wish to overwrite.

================

Known Issues:
The bonus points aren\\\'t added until you leave the leveling screen.

================

Questions, comments and bug reports goes into the comments.

================
